title: Train services as usual today
body_lines: After lifting the curfew at 5.00 am today, all trains were back on line as per the usual and scheduled time table, the control room said.
All long-distance trains are also will be in operation as usual, except the night mail trains for Jaffna and Batticoloa.
Meanwhile, they said the time table will be subject to change according to the curfew time schedule. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
